faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Find answers to popular questions about Qzvert

whatIsQzvert.question: What is Qzvert? How is it different from regular online learning apps?
whatIsQzvert.answer: Qzvert is an "AI Edutainment Platform" that transforms dry learning content into simulated worlds (Contextual Learning). We don't just let you read or watch - we let you "play a role" and use real knowledge to conquer missions, making learning as fun as playing an RPG game.

needSkills.question: Do I need programming or game design skills to use it?
needSkills.answer: Not at all! That's the heart of Qzvert. You just need to upload content (video, PDF, or article link). Our AI GM will act as a "game engineer" to create maps, stages, and quizzes for you automatically in seconds.

existingCourse.question: Can I use Qzvert with courses I'm already selling?
existingCourse.answer: Absolutely! Qzvert is designed to be an "Add-on Layer". You can share Quest links to your learners after they finish watching lessons to increase retention and impress them enough to spread the word.

dataSafe.question: Is my uploaded content data safe?
dataSafe.answer: We prioritize privacy and data security as number one. Content you upload will only be used to create quests in your account, and we have international standard encryption to prevent unauthorized access.

wrongAnswers.question: What happens if I answer questions wrong frequently?
wrongAnswers.answer: In Qzvert's world, wrong answers aren't failure - they're learning! If you answer wrong, your Energy might decrease or the story might become more challenging. But don't worry, our AI will send "Hints" or secret helpers to help you improve and conquer the boss again.

xpItems.question: What are XP points and items for?
xpItems.answer: These points show your progression. You can use them to upgrade your Avatar, unlock secret stages, or redeem special privileges from Creators (like discounts on next courses or secret documents), creating pride in every step of learning.

aiAccuracy.question: How accurate is the AI processing?
aiAccuracy.answer: We use Gemini 2.5 Flash, the latest AI focused on speed and high accuracy. However, the system always provides tools for Creators to "Review & Edit" AI-generated content before publishing.

cancelSubscription.question: If I subscribe monthly (Pro), when can I cancel?
cancelSubscription.answer: You have complete freedom! You can cancel your subscription anytime through the Dashboard with no hidden fees. Quests you've created will still be stored in the system (according to package terms).
